CustomField.formula: TEXT( Account.Donor_Level__c ) = "Mid-Level Low" || TEXT(Account.Donor_Level__c) = "Mid-Level High" || TEXT(Account.Current_Ladder__c ) = "Global Citizens" || TEXT(Account.Current_Ladder__c ) = "Global Leaders"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Digital Communication's use. Any donor whose donor level is "mid-level low" OR "mid-level high" or whose donor ladder level is "Global Citizens" OR "Global Leaders".
CustomField.label: Mid-Level Donor (Comms)
